# keyboardDismissMode

**Instance Property**

The manner in which the system dismisses the keyboard when a drag begins in the scroll view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var keyboardDismissMode: UIScrollView.KeyboardDismissMode { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIScrollView/KeyboardDismissMode-swift.enum/none]. See [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIScrollView/KeyboardDismissMode-swift.enum] for possible values.

## Dismissing the keyboard

- **UIScrollView.KeyboardDismissMode**: Constants that determine how the system dismisses the keyboard when a drag begins in the scroll view.
